name: Water Knock
description:
The worst thing in the world is to try to sleep and not to, better knock the birds to make them fly and reach the new funny levels. Dish out those sleepless birds and you will enjoy the physics-based gameplay. Be aware each level requires a good amount of logical thinking and less gaming skill. Time to jump into exciting challenges and bump up the birds to make them fly high. We limit the water to power up unlimited fun.

FEATURES:
- Enjoy the gameplay of knocking the birds with water!
- Single tap controls and easy to learn mechanics along with stunning visual effects.
- Unlimited levels and Unlimited fun!
- Lots of structures that will look nice when it collapses!
- Download and play for free!
